bibl.title: The Jon Hosking Collection of Ptolemaic Coins.
bibl.note: Introduction to Ptolemaic Coinage. - Abbreviations and Bibliography. - The Jon Martin Hosking [† 1989] Collection. - Catalogue [Nos 1-178].
PITCHFORK Colin E., The Jon Hosking Collection of Ptolemaic Coins.
Sydney, University of Sydney. Nicholson Museum, in association with Noble Numismatics Pty. Ltd., 2000, 8°, xxi-72 pp., 1 portrait, 178 reproductions de monnaies. ISBN 0-646-39589-0.
